Class DiscountMainApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.socgen.challenge.apparel.discount.DiscountMainApp

  • public class DiscountMainApp
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    reju.pillai@gmail.com This class is responsible to process input from StdIn, calculate discount on the chosen products and show discounted price on stdOut.
